meanings.definition: A type of fudge made with brown sugar and butter.
meanings.sent1: I made some delicious penuche for the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: The penuche at the candy store looked so tempting.
meanings.sent3: The penuche fudge was so sweet, it made my teeth ache.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a piece of penuche.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of penuche filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: The walls of the house were painted in a lovely penuche shade.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had a beautiful penuche hue in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The penuche color of the leaves in autumn was breathtaking.
meanings.sent4: The penuche sky at sunset painted a stunning picture.
meanings.sent5: The penuche carpet in the living room added warmth to the space.
